record.id: field.name="name" and file.name="extaccess" and term=NULL and format.name=NULL and syslanguage="en"
record.field.name: name
record.file.name: extaccess

brief.brief: The Service Manager table name that will be published in the Web Services API.

detail.detail: The Web Services API only publishes the tables listed in the extaccess table. The drop-down list of valid tables includes the names of all Service Manager tables, including join files. A join file will only be included in the list if the files defined for that join file have One-to-One relationships as defined in their associated erddef record(s).
